latestVersion.termsOfUse: Until the data are released publicly in full, downloading these datasets implies accepting the rules and policy of data usage of the Localmultidem and MDE collaboration and not sharing the data with people who are not collaborators in publications.
latestVersion.restrictions: The use of the data on WP3 (organisational survey) is temporarily restricted to the Localmultidem and MDE network members. This restriction will be lifted as soon as we can confirm that no major mistakes remain in the data.
latestVersion.citationRequirements: Please use the proper citation to the dataset included on the main page of this Dataverse collection: Kucaba, Katarzyna; Rodriguez, Elisa; Morales, Laura; Cinalli, Manlio; Devadason, Ranji; Eggert, Nina; Jacobs, Dirk; Jorba, Laia; Myrberg, Gunnar; Nasri, Foued; Pilati, Katia; Ramos, Rosa Marcela; Ros, Virginia; Thys, Rebecca; Váradi, Luca; Zakariás, Ildikó , 2017, "LOCALMULTIDEM and MDE Organisational Survey (WP3) Dataset, 2003-2010", doi:10.7910/DVN/I27TAR, Harvard Dataverse, Version 1.
latestVersion.disclaimer: The data producers and depositors bear no responsibility on the analyses and conclusions produced by users of these datasets.
latestVersion.termsOfAccess: Access restricted to Localmultidem and MDE users temporarily until all checks relating to data quality have been completed. If you require access, send an email requesting it to Laura Morales.

fields.value: LOCALMULTIDEM and MDE Organisational Survey (WP3) Dataset, 2003-2010

dsDescriptionValue.value: This study contains the data collected through Workpackage 3 of the Localmultidem project and through other related sister projects that formed part of the Multicultural Democracy in Europe (MDE) research network. It also contains the documentation (questionnaires, codebook, etc.) required to understand and analyze the data. This workpackage involved collecting information at the organisational (or meso) level through a survey of migrant organisations. It contains data for the following cities: Barcelona and municipalities of Barcelona region, Brussels, Budapest, Geneva, Girona, London, Lyon, Madrid, Milan, Murcia, Stockholm, and Zurich.

publicationCitation.value:
1) Morales, Laura, and Marco G. Giugni, eds. Social Capital, Political Participation and Migration in Europe. Making Multicultural Democracy Work? Basingstoke: Palgrave, 2011.

2) Morales, Laura, and Katia Pilati. 2014. "The political transnationalism of Ecuadorians in Barcelona, Madrid and Milan: the role of individual resources, organizational engagement and the political context."  Global Networks 14 (1):80-102.

3) Morales, Laura, and Luis Ramiro. 2011. "Gaining Political Capital through Social Capital. Inclusion in Policy Making and Network Embeddedness of Immigrants’ Associations in Spain."  Mobilization 16 (2):147-164.

4) Morales, Laura, and Laia Jorba. 2010. "The transnational practices of immigrants' associations in Spain." In Diaspora and Transnationalism: Concepts, Theories and Methods, edited by Rainer Bauböck and Thomas Faist, 267-293. Amsterdam: Amsterdam University Press.

5) Morales, Laura, Amparo González, and Laia Jorba. 2009. "Políticas de incorporación y asociacionismo de la población de origen inmigrante a nivel local." In Políticas de gobernabilidad de la inmigración en España, edited by Ricard Zapata-Barrero, 113-137. Barcelona: Ariel.

6) Morales, L., E. Anduiza, L. Jorba, J. San Martín & A. González (2009). Actituds, comportament polític i xarxes organitzatives dels immigrants a la ciutat de Barcelona. Informes Breus 15. Barcelona: Fundació Jaume Bofill. http://www.fbofill.cat/sites/default/files/492.pdf 

7) Laura Morales, Amparo González & Laia Jorba: “Políticas Locais e Associativismo Imigrante em Espanha” Migrações- Revista do Observatório da Imigração, vol. 6, 2010.

8) Jorba, L., Galais, C., & Anduiza, E. (2009). Xarxes organitzatives immigrants a l'àmbit municipal. Estudi comparatiu de les capitals i àrees metropolitanes de Barcelona, Madrid, Girona i Múrcia. http://www.um.es/capsocinmig/Documentos/GENE.pdf & http://governacio.gencat.cat/web/.content/qualitat_democratica/02_divulgacio__formacio_i_recerca/04_recerca/arxius/xarxes_immigrants.pdf 

9) Laia Jorba & Josep San Martín: "La integració sociopolítica i el capital social dels immigrants: El cas de Barcelona", Eines, vol. 11, 2010: 87-100.

10) Ortega, M. P., & Morales, L. (2006). Las asociaciones de la población inmigrante en el municipio de Madrid: un informe sobre sus perfiles organizativos, relación con la política y redes interorganizativas. Report. <http://www.um.es/capsocinmig/Documentos/Docu1.pdf>.  

11) Pilati, Katia, and Laura Morales. 2016. "Ethnic and immigrant politics vs. mainstream politics: the role of ethnic organizations in shaping the political participation of immigrant-origin individuals in Europe."  Ethnic and Racial Studies:1-22. doi: 10.1080/01419870.2016.1181270.

12) Pilati, Katia. 2012. “Network resources and political engagement of migrant organizations in Milan.” in Journal of Ethnic and Migration Studies. 38/4: 671-688. DOI: 10.1080/1369183X.2012.640491

13) Pilati, Katia. 2010. “Civic and political engagement by immigrant organisations in Italy. The case study of Milan”, in Horta, A. P. B. (org.), Migrações - special issue ‘Associativismo Imigrante’ 6: 145-159, http://www.oi.acidi.gov.pt/docs/Revista_6/Migr6_Sec1_Art6.pdf

14) Eggert, Nina and Katia, Pilati. 2014. “Networks and political engagement of migrant organisations in five European cities”. European Journal of Political Research. 53: 858–875, doi: 10.1111/1475-6765.12057 

15) Eggert, Nina (2014). ‘The Impact of Political Opportunities on Inter-Organizational Networks: A Comparison of Migrants’ Organizational Fields’, Mobilization, 19(4):369-386. 

16) Eggert, Nina (2011). The Impact of Political Opportunity Structures on Networks of Immigrant Associations: A Comparison of Two European Cities. PhD Dissertation. University of Geneva and University of Trento.  

17) Myrberg, Gunnar (2013)”Surveying migrants and migrant associations in Stockholm”. In Joan Font and Mónica Méndez (eds.) Surveying ethnic minorities and immigrant populations: Methodological challenges and research strategies. Amsterdam: Amsterdam University Press (p. 131–146).

18) Strömblad, Per and Bo Bengtsson (2015)”Collective political action as civic voluntarism: Analysing ethnic associations as political participants by translating individual level theory to the organizational level”. Kalmar and Växjö: Linnaus University. 

19) Strömblad, Per, Gunnar Myrberg and Bo Bengtsson (2011) “Optimal opportunities for ethnic organisation and political integration? Comparing Stockholm with other European cities”. In Laura Morales and Marco Giugni (eds.) Social capital, political participation and migration in Europe: Making multicultural democracy work. Houndmills: Palgrave Macmillan (p. 172–197).

20) Strömblad, Per and Bo Bengtsson (2009) “Empowering members of ethnic organisations. Tracing the political integration potential of immigrant associations in Stockholm”. Scandinavian Political Studies 32: 296–314.

files.description: This deliverable contains the city reports for Workpackage 3. It provides description and discussion of the migrants organisations mapped and interviewed in each city of the Localmultidem project (Budapest, London, Lyon, Madrid, Milan, Zurich).
files.label: City Reports (WP3) Deliverable 10.pdf

dataFile.description: This deliverable contains the city reports for Workpackage 3. It provides description and discussion of the migrants organisations mapped and interviewed in each city of the Localmultidem project (Budapest, London, Lyon, Madrid, Milan, Zurich).

files.description: This file contains city specific questions related to question 56 about the contact with politicians and authorities. It is organised on city by city basis and matches city specific questions to the questions from the main questionnaire and variables in the main dataset. When applicable, city specific variables are included to provide an overview.
files.label: Contact with authorities_Q56 (WP3).xlsx
